item.title: Finding Martin's b - Fitting a Martin curve to vertical flux profiles
item.description: When we look at what sinking matter in the ocean is up to, one of the key metrics is describing the decrease of flux with depth (the ‘flux attenuation’). As particles sink, they get reworked and eaten by the animals and microbes living in the deep ocean.
